text: naee subah se aage
veena ke jeevan mein ek naya adhyaay jud gaya
dev gaya arun mil gaya
pichhale kuchh varsh kaee janmon ka lekh samet lae the
ek janm tha dev se shaadee se pahale ka jo ab door ka sapana lagata hai
jo janm kabhee tha hee nahin jo veena ke is chole ne kabhee dekha hee nahin
bas usakee kalpana maan hee kar sakatee hai kalpana hai kaheen tha vah alhadapan kaheen thee vah mastee kaheen thee vah khushee vah umang vah tarang
sab ek chhalaava maan hee lagata hai
ab ve din nahin aa sakate
aaenge bhee to apane na lagenge
doosara janm tha dev ke saath ka
do varsh ka saath do janmasa hai
shaayad usase bhee jyaada
dev ke saath bitaaya ekek din ek varsh samaan tha
duhkh tha usaka lekin aasha thee saath jeene kee umang thee
dar to us aasha us umang us lagn ko dekhakar kaheen chhupasa gaya tha
tabhee to dev ke saath rahate hue veena ne roj nae sapane bune the aur tabhee to usake jaane ke baad bhee usane amit aur priya ka vivaah rachaaya tha
apane haathon se usane priya ko menhandee lagaee thee apane haathon se usane use vivaah ka joda pahanaaya tha
veena ka teesara janm ab shuru hua hai arun ke aane par
vivaah ke baad veena ko koee sasuraal nahin mila is baar
pita ka ghar to arun ke lie kaanto kee sej se kam na tha
usase to usaka sambandh bhee na tha
arun kee maan akelee chhotese kiraaye ke phlait mein rahatee thee
kabhee kisee bete ne use apane saath rakhane kee peshakash na kee thee
aise mein use bhee kisee ka bojh banakar rahana manjoor na tha
dillee pahunch kar veena ko aasha thee usakee aaratee hogee koee svaagat ko khada hoga usaka pahale se
shaayad shahanaee baje isakee bhee kalpana kar lee thee usane
veena kuchh adhik hee aashaavaadee thee
aasha se adhik aashaavaadee hona hee duhkhon ka mool kaaran hai
iseelie use sab achchha hee dikhaee deta tha
lekin ye kya taiksee to bajae krashna nagar jaane ke seedha dariyaaganj sthit aagara hotal pahunch gaee
arun ke min ne pahale se hee kamara rijarv karava liya tha usake lie
chaay peekar maan arun ke min ke saath chalee gaee
jaatejaate bas itana hee bolee deharaadoon vaapis lautane se pahale milana jarur
veena ko kuchh samajh nahee aaya bas jee bhar kah sakee
arun aur veena ab akele rah gae the
arun romaantik hua ja raha tha
lekin veena chintit thee
rah na sakee chup aur bolee arun se kya ham yaheen rahenge
haan aur kahaan mere kanaada jaane tak arun ne sahaj bhaav se kaha
aisa kyon kya ham maan jee ke saath nahin rah sakate yahaan hotal mein bahut atapata lagega
veena ko samajh nahee aa raha tha ki aisa kyon kar raha hai arun
are kais atapata main paradesee hoon baahar se aaya hoon aur kuchh dinon baad tumhen bhee paradesh jaana hai
aise mein hotal mein rahana hee theek hai
maan ke ek kamare ke phlait mein kaise rah sakate hai ham arun ab bhee nahee samajh pa raha tha veena kee manodasha ko
vah to theek hai lekin aapake rishtedar hain sab yahaan
maama hai aapake pahale to aap vaheen thahare the
ab shaadee ke baad ekaek unake paas na rahane ka kya kaaran hai
veena kee baat beech mein hee kaat dee arun ne bhee sabako rojaroj tang to nahin kiya ja sakata
aur hamen bhee praeevesee chaahie
betaab tha arun baat badalana chaah raha tha
bola ab chhodo in baaton ko aao mere paas baitho
aur arun ne veena ko apanee baahon mein kheench liya ekaek
lekin veena chhatapata kar hat gaee
aisa kya abhee kuchh achchha nahee lag raha
abhee main pareshaan hoon
main samajh nahee pa rahee apanee sthiti
shaadee ho gaee aap kanaada vaapis jaenge
sab theek hai
lekin main yahaan apanee saas ke paas nahin rah paungee
ek hotal mein vah bhee gandese hotal mein rahoongee aur yaheen se das din baad vaapis maayake laut jaungee aisa nahee jaanatee thee main
aisa nahee kaha tha aapane
veena kee pareshaanee arun ko atapatee lag rahee thee
lekin purush jab divaana hota hai us samay stree kee har baat ko maan jaata hai
usaka gunagaan karata hai usakee gulaamee karana chaahata hai
lekin sab kaamagni ke rahate
aisa hee arun ke saath ho raha tha
baith gaya veena ke kadamon mein aur usakee taangon ko apanee baanhon ke ghere mein lekar bola tum kyon pareshaan ho veena aisa kuchh bhee nahee hai
ek kamara unake paas ham rahenge vahaan ya maan aur maan apanee gareebee nahee dikhaana chaahatee tumhen
raayabahaadur kee betee raayabahaadur utam prakaash kee patnee havelee ke hote chhoteesee kotharee mein apanee bahoo ko nahee thahara sakatee
sab kuchh to bataaya tumhen apana apane parivaar ka itihaas
vah bhaav vihval ho raha tha
veena se lipat jaane ko betaab
bola phir se aur rahee rishtedaaron kee baat
sab rishtedaar dikhaavatee hain
darate hai abhee bhee mere baap se
iseelie vah shaadee mein shareek bhee nahee hue aur iseelie shaadee ke baad main unake ghar nahee jaana chaahata
arun ekaek bhaavuk ho utha
usakee aankhen nam dekhakar veena aashvast ho gaee
use arun hee apana sab kuchh najar aaya
sochane lagee arun mera bhala hee to chaahega vah jo kar raha hai theek hai
man ko tasallee dee aur man kee baat aasha kee jyoti jaga gaee usake man mein
bas veena usee jyoti ke sahaare arun mein sama jaane ko betaab ho gaee
use pyaar karate yahee lag raha tha ki yahee kamee thee jo pooree ho gaee arun ke aane se
aur aise mein aurat bhee sau khoon maaph kar detee hain
das din baad arun laut gaya kanaada
jaane se pahale veena apanee saas se milane gaee krashna nagar
ghar dekhakar use man mein arun kee baat theek lagee
tang galee mein sau gaj ke ghar mein ek chhotaasa kamara aur chhotaasa gusalakhaana aur baraamade mein teen sheet se banee rasoee
kahaan deharaadoon mein unaka do beeghe ka ghar aur phir dev ka ghar aur ab yah ghar
achchha hee kiya jo arun ne use vahaan laakar nahee rakha
vah kahaan rah paatee
man hee man ghutatee rahatee
aise mein achchha hai ki kanaada jaane tak vah apanee maan ke paas hee rahe deharaadoon
arun ke jaane ke baad jab maan ko usane sab baat bataee to nirmala phir se chintit hokar kah uthee betee mer dil dar se tej dhadakane laga hai teree baat sunakar
kaheen jaldabaajee mein videsh ka chakkar mahanga na pad jae na jaane vahaan kaise rahata hoga
tab veena ke man mein jagee aasha kee jyoti phir se bol uthee are maan kaisee baat karatee ho dekha na usakee maan kee majabooree bhee to hai
kisee ne saath nahee diya usaka
jo kuchh kiya usake saath usake pati ne phir bhee usane himmat nahee haaree
lad rahee hai akele
khud ke bhaee bhee darate hai usake
aur arun vah to pachees varsh se kanaada mein hai
digree dekhee hai usakee baat karane ka lahaja dekha hai inshyorens kampanee ka mainejar koee kamee nahee hogee
mera arun kaheen kisee se kam nahin hoga
maine itane dinon mein hee jaan liya hai
veena maan ko tasallee de rahee thee svayan ko bhee aise hee dilaasa detee thee
ab arun kee nishaanee bhee usake pet mein aakar use gudagudaatee jo rahatee thee har dam
usane dev kee chhavi dekh lee thee shaayad arun mein ya phir dev ko bhool jaane ka raasta dikha diya tha arun ne
arun kee divaanee subahashaam ghadiyaan gin rahee thee kanaada jaane kee
jo din ham jeete hai us din ka hisaab din beetane par hee mil jaata hai
subah se shaam hone tak lagata hai bahut kaam kiya hai din bhar
thak kar ghar lautate hai
aaraam karate hai
nae din kee shuruaat ke lie
dinadin ginate hain
aur beete dino ka hisaab lagaane ka mauka nahee milata

milata hai kabhee to ekaek mahasoos hota hai are kitanee jaldee samay beet gaya jo pal pal kabhee bojhil lagate hai jo din kabhee bitae nahin beetata vah sab vyastata ke saath itanee jaldee beet jaate hain isaka hisaab hee nahee rahata
sabakee apanee dinacharya hai
karm mein itanee talleen hai har jindagee ki kisee ko chinta bhee nahee rahatee doosaron kee
sab apanee jindagee jeete hai
ekadoosare se jo bandha hai ekadoosare ke paas jo hai usee par dhyaan kendrit rahata hai
aankhon se door jo baitha hai vah to khaalee samay mein hee yaad aata hai
usakee chinta to vyastata mein nahin sataatee
iseelie bachche apaneeapanee jindagee jeete hain
maanbaap apanee jindagee jeete hain
kuchh khabar lagatee hai kisee apane kee to chinta hotee hai
varana lagata hai jaise hamaaree gaadee chal rahee hai vaise hee doosaro kee chal rahee hogee
mai achchha hoon to jag achchha hai
mai duhkhee hoon to jag duhkhee lagata hai
mera man dukhee hai to doosare kee hansee achchhee nahin lagatee
veena kanaada mein hai sukhee hee hogee
kyonki jabajab usakee chitthee aatee hai yahee likha hota hai
maan ko isee se tasallee hai
veena ka apana hansataakhelata parivaar hai do betiyaan ek beta
sab bachche kitane pyaare hain
unake photo dekhakar yahee lagata hai
ab isase jyaada koee kya jaane
haan nirmala kee ek hee ichchha thee ki veena ek baar aae mil jae sabhee ko
pannaalaal bhee yahee chaahate the
sab bachche chhuttee ke dinon mein deharaadoon ikatathe hote the lekin veena kee anupasthiti sabako khalatee thee
usake jaane ke baad geeta kee shaadee bhee ho gaee
prem ne bhee premavivaah kar liya
lekin veena aane ke naam par hamesha taal jaatee kaise aa sakatee hoon jindagee bahut vyast hai
yahee napaatula bahaana hota tha usaka
arun se kabheekabhaar amit kee baat hotee thee
use to ek baat karanee amit se dhyaan rahatee yahaan indiya mein rakha hee kya hai duniyaan kitanee aage nikal gaee hai
ham indiya aakar kya karenge jo bhee vahaan se aata hai yahee bataata hai ki kuchh bhee nahee badala
sab kaam adhoore pade rahate hai
har jagah rishvatakhoree hai
itanee adhik kaamachoree hai tabhee to meree maan ke jeete jee usaka kort ka phaasala nahee ho saka
mera baap hamaaree khaanadaanee jaayadaad bech kar apane haraamee bachchon ko aish karaane mein luta raha hai
koee kuchh nahee karata
main indiya aana chaahata hoon tabhee jab koee meree madad kare
mere baap ko kaanoon ke ghere mein laana hai
tum yadi koshish karo to yah kaam ho sakata hai
main tumhen piteeshan banaakar bhej sakata hoon

kya tum meree arjee praeem ministar la ministar tak pahuncha kar aisa aadar le sakate ho ki vah apanee pahalee patnee aur asalee bachchon ke saath phraad karane ke jurm mein jel chala jae aur mujhe mera hak mil jae

aise mein amit yadi usase kahata ki yah sab kuchh kitana aur kaise ho sakata hai isaka pata tabhee lagega jab arun kuchh samay ke lie indiya aa jae aur apane va apane bhaeeyon ke saath milakar nae sire se kes phaeel kare
aise mein arun yahee kahakar taal jaata chalo banaunga prograam lekin saath hee usaka ek hee bahaana shuru ho jaata aisa indiya mein ho sakega nahin maaloom
yahaan sab dakiyaanoosee logon ka raaj hain
amit bhee tang aa jaata tha aur baat samaapt kar deta yahee kahakar aap na jaane kaun see duniyaan mein rahate hai arun jee
yahaan sab badal chuka hai
log khushahaal hai
nyaay jarur milata hai yadi koee koshish kare
aap aaen yahaan jis vakeel se milana hoga milenge
lekin aapake vahaan baithane se kuchh nahee ho sakata
baat vaheen khatm ho jaatee
veena to phon par keval haan na mein hee baat karatee thee
arun hamesha doosare phon se saaree baaten sunata rahata tha aur aise mein baaten bhee kya hotee keval yahee ki sab theek hai
bachche achchhe hai
main theek hoon
roj kaam par jaatee hoon
isase aage jitane munh utanee baaten
ghar mein sabhee jab ikatathe hote yahee baaten hotee rahatee
arun kanjoos hai
indiya kharche ke kaaran nahee aana chaahata
shaayad itana stetas hee nahee hai usaka ki kharcha sahan kare
lekin sachchaee kya hai kisee ko nahee pata
samay pankh laga kar udata raha
pannaalaalanirmala budhaape kee or badh gae the
sab parivaar phalaphool raha tha
prem ab karnal ban gaya tha
geeta kaalej mein lekcharaar thee
amitapriya vyaapaar mein kaaphee unnati kar chuke the
pandrah varsh beet gae veena ke aane kee koee khabar nahee thee
aise mein ek din amitapriya ne prograam banaaya garmee kee chhuttiyon mein amerika ghoomane ka
saath hee mein kanaada jaakar veena se milane ka
amitapriya aur donon bachche itane vyast ho gae apana prograam banaane mein sab kuchh tay ho jaane par priya ne veena ko phon kiya
priya ne apane aane kee khabar dete hue veena se kaha deedee tum to aatee nahee ham aa rahe hai aapake paas
vishvaas nahee ho raha apane kaanon par
sach kah rahee ho veena ke shabdon mein avishvaas jhalak raha tha
ha deedee main amit aur varun snigdha sabhee
pahale das din ham aapake paas rahenge aur phir ek maheena ham amerika kee sair karenge
priya ke shabdon mein khushee jhalak rahee thee
sach priya mujhe abhee bhee vishvaas nahee ho raha
kab aa rahe ho kaun see phlait se ham toronto se chhah sau meel door hain
mujhe jaldee se batao veena khushee se ekaek jhoomane lagee thee
mai sab vivaran phaiks kar detee hoon aapako
ham maee ko pahunchenge toronto
vah svayan mainej kar lenge ham
raat tak aapake paas pahunch jaenge
priya ne apana prograam use bataaya
veena ko lag raha tha jaise vah sapana dekh rahee hai
khushee se usakee aankhen chhalak gaee
gala bhar aaya aur bolee main abhee se tum sabakee prateeksha karane lagee hoon
bahutabahut pyaar tum sabako
jaldee aao tum sabase milakar bahut achchha lagega
aur veena phaphak uthee khushee se
jaise bahut baaten karanee ho use priya se
abhee se betaab ho uthee thee vah
phon rakhakar vah arun se bolee jo chupachaap doosara phon kaan par lagae dono bahanon kee baat sun raha tha dekho aakhir amitapriya aa rahe hain hamase milane
tumhen meree khaatir ab unhen riseev karane jaana hoga toronto
haanhaan jaunga jarur jaunga phon par nahin ho sakatee baaten ab vistaar se baithakar usase baat karunga apane kes ke baare mein
lagata hai vah bahut bada seth ban gaya hai
tabhee to beesapachchees hajaar daalar kharch karane kee yojana hai usakee is toor par arun bhee utsaahit tha usake aane kee khabar sunakar
jarur karana arun par pleej saara taim isee charcha mein na lage rahana
kaheen bor na ho jaen
veena shaayad is charcha se pareshaan rahatee thee
are apane hai tabhee to bin bulae aa rahe hain
aur phir jab hamaare paas aakar rahenge to baat to kuchh karanee hee hai
apanon ko hee apana kasht bataaya ja sakata hai
arun apanee kahaanee bataane ko betaab tha
koee naya sunane vaala use milane aa raha tha
chalo theek hai
ab jaisetaise ghar theek kar len
bachche abhee skool se lautenge to unhen bhee yah nyooj denee hai
sab khush ho jaenge
veena khushee se phoolee nahin sama rahee thee
usane abhee se din ginane shuru kar die the
naee duniya naya desh
ek naya parivesh
naeenee mukhaakratiyaan
lekin sabhee ajanabee
bheed ke rele se baahar nikalate sabhee man hee man ghabarae hue the

toronto se chhah sau meel door jaana tha man hee man amit isee udhedabun mein tha ki baahar nikalate hee ek adhed vyakti ek pahachaanaasa chehara ples kaard lie khada tha jis par likha tha arun basanl aapaka svaagat karata hai
mehamaan ka naam nahin tha lekin amit ekadam pahachaan gaya
yah arun hee hai
veena ka pati
amit ne priya ko bataaya
bachchon ne bhee suna aur sabane dekha usee or
sabhee ke cheharon se chinta ekaek lupt ho gaee
lambe saphar kee thakaan udanachhoo ho gaee
thake hue chehare khil gae
haathapair sphoorti se bhar gae aur sabane haath uthaakar arun ka abhibhaadan kiya
svaagat hai aap sabhee ka
garm joshee se arun ne aage badhakar amit ko gale lagaaya
ekek karake sabhee se mila
varun ne jab arun ke pair chhue to vah bhaavavibhor ho gaya
jaise use bhooleebisaree bhaarateey parampara yaad ho aaee ho
aasha thee aapako ki main yahaan miloonga arun ne poochha
imigreshan par pahunch kar ekaek na jaane kyon priya ko kaha tha maine ki baahar aap milenge
amit ne jo mahasoos kiya tha vah bata diya
saamaan kee traalee lie sabhee kaar paarking kee or chal diy
baahar dhoop thee
samay tha din ke do baje ka
taareekh vahee thee jo kal apane desh se chalate samay thee
samay kee sueeyaan theek saadhe das ghante peechhe karanee thee
hamen ghar pahunchane mein kitana samay lagega jeeja jee priya ne poochha arun se
kam se kam saat ghante
chinta na karo saphar yoon hee kat jaeg
raasta bahut khoobasoorat hai aur dherasee baaten karate hai
aapakee pichhale pandrah saalo kee baaten hai
aur meree pichhalee tees saalon kee baate hai
saat ghante kya saat din bhee kam hai
amitapriya ko achchhee lag rahee thee varun kee baate
kaar mein baithate hee bachche to ekadam gaharee neend mein so gae
aur amit va priya shishtaachaar aur arun ke apanepan se behaal hue neend kee behaalee ko bhoole hue the
saat ghante saat yugon ke samaan the priya ke lie
bachche sote rahe is beech
amit kabhee so jaata kabhee uth jaata
arun kee bolane kee shakit dekhakar priya aashcharyachakit thee
vah to teparikaardar kee tarah saat ghante bolata hee raha
kuchh sunane kee shakti to usamen jaise thee hee nahee
priya shishtaachaaravash sunatee rahee
lekin sach baat to yah thee ki arun kee kahee sabhee baaten keval kaanon ne hee sunee
kuchh yaad rahee kuchh bhooleesee mahasoos huee
raasta bahut sundar tha
jheelon ka desh tha yah
harebhare upavan neele paanee kee bharee jheelen aur meelon lambee sadak
trephik naam maan
aisa saphar ek sundar svarg kee bhaanti prateet ho raha tha
raat das baje aakhir ve ghar pahunche
baahar hee khadee thee veena
pandrah varsh baad ekadoosare ko dekhakar bhaavavibhor ho uthe sabhee
baarabaar gale lagatee bahanen
teen bachche the veena ke
do ladakiyaan ek ladaka
priya amit unase milate rahe
ve arunasnigdha se mile
bas bhaavanaon mein badhe sabhee baithe rahe
raat kab beetee pata bhee nahee chala
tumhen milakar aisa lag raha hai kaee yug beet gae
priya ko apane saamane bithaakar veena apane bachchon kee tarah use sahala rahee thee
badee bahan thee priya kee
poore aath varsh badee
bachapan mein pyaar se godee mein uthakar ghoomatee thee use
jab priya skool jaane ko huee to usakee chotee bhee baandhatee thee
pyaar se kabheekabhaar usake lie apane jeb kharch mein se kuchh upahaar bhee le aatee thee
aur to aur jab amit ko usane pahalee baar dev ke saath dekha tha to ekaek praarthana bhee kar baithee thee ki priya ko amitasa hee var mile
veena ke bhaagy mein jo likha tha vahee hua
priya ke lie usane jo chaaha tha vahee mila use bhee
pandrah varsh baad mile deedee ham
varun chhah maheene ka tha
aaj dasaveen mein padhata hai
priya bhee bhaavavihaval apanee bahan kee or dekhe ja rahee thee
saamane raho to lagata hai vakt kee raphtaar bahut dheemee hai
aankhon se door rahakar vakt ka dhyaan hee nahin rahata
veena ne beete dinon kee yaadon mein khoe hue kaha
ham apaneeapanee jindagee jeete hain hamaara samay usee mein kat jaata hai
jab kabhee dinacharya se vakt milata hai door baithe apane priyajanon kee yaad aa jaatee hai
tab samay ko dekhakar ekaek hairaanee hotee hai
itane din ho gae dekhe apane kisee priy ko
priya bhaavuk hai sada se
aankhen chhalak aatee hai usakee jhat se
ashrumishrit shabdon se bol rahee thee lekin hamaare bade hamaare mammeedaidee jinhen ab aur kuchh kaam nahee hai unase poochhie
har samay aapako hee yaad karate hai
hamen to mil lete hai maheenedomaheene mein aur aapako nahee dekha itane samay se
bas aapakee hee baaten karate rahate
veena kaisee hogee usake bachche kaise honge pati kaisa hoga vah khush to hai unakee dinacharya ka bada bhaag to aap hee kee baaten karate beet jaata hai
aansoo ab bah nikale the priya ke bheeg gaya tha svar usaka daidee to aapako pata hai kuchh jyaada nahee bolate
mammee bas har baat mein koee aisee baat nikaal letee hai aur aapakee misaal jarur detee hai
sab betiyon mein aap hee se sabase jyaada bandhee lagatee hai
aisa kya hai jo aap ek baar bhee unase milane ka vakt nahin nikaal paeen poochh liya priya ne
veena ekaek kuchh na bol paee
priya ne tab phir kaha amit ke kitane dost yahaan rahate hai sab saal mein ekado maheene ke lie jarur aate hai indiya
ek min to aisa hai jisaka koee sagaasambandhee ab nahin bacha vahaan phir bhee chala aata hai apanee yaaden taajee karane
aur kisee ko nahin to amit se milane
tab veena ne kaha sabhee kee apaneeapanee majabooriyaan hain priya
tumhaare jeeja ko jaise indiya ke naam se bukhaar chadh jaata hai
kaee kadavee yaaden hain unakee jinhen vah bhulae baithe hain
yahee kahate hai har baar vahaan jaunga phir lipat jaengee sab
koee nahin hai aisa jisake lie indiya jaun
veena ne shabd jaise udhaar lie the arun se
apana jaise koee astitv hee nahin tha usaka
tab priya ne kaha un kadavee yaadon se hee nikal kar unhonne aapako bhee to dhoondha tha aapako pa liya apana parivaar basa liya
yahee sansaar hai unaka aur us sansaar mein aapaka apana astitv bhee to hai vahaan jo aapake apane hain unamen to kuchh kadavaapan nahin
unamen to mithaas dhoondhee ja sakatee hai
ab to ham sab log unake apane hai
rishte samajhane kee cheej hai rishte apanaane ke lie banate hai
aur unake lie kuchh na kuchh bhoolana bhee padata hai
priya ne samajhe veena ke manobhaav aur samajha un shabdon mein chhipe bhaavon ka arth
usee lay mein usane shabd baandh lie the
lekin veena kis mittee kee banee thee vah samajhana shaayad usake bas kee baat nahin thee
veena ko laga vah priya se lambee baat karane ke lie abhee taiyaar nahee hai
aise mein baat samaapt karate hue bolee abhee is vishay par baat nahin karate
tum hee poochh lena apane jeeja jee se
sab baat samajh aa jaegee
chalo ab so jao saphar kee thakaan mita lo
abhee bahut din hai saath
sab samajh aa jaega
aur veena priya ko usake kamare tak chhod aaee jahaan amit pahale se soya hua tha
